## Target Branch

- [ ] `dev` (default for most changes)
- [ ] `nightly` (promotion/staging)
- [ ] `main` (stable release only)

## Checklist

- [ ] Rust: `cargo fmt`, `cargo check --features all`, `cargo test --features all`
- [ ] If applicable: `horizons_py` tests pass
- [ ] If applicable: `horizons_ts` build/tests pass
- [ ] Migration/rollout notes included (if this changes prod behavior)

## Summary

Describe the change and its impact.
